content: Please analyze the SalesOrders section of the sap_data.csv file. Focus only on sales order header data. Look for patterns, anomalies, and important metrics. Identify fields like SALESORDERID, CREATEDBY, CREATEDAT, PARTNERID, GROSSAMOUNT, NETAMOUNT, etc.

Please analyze the SalesOrderItems section of the sap_data.csv file. Focus only on sales order line item data. Identify relationships with the sales orders data from agent1. Look for fields like SALESORDERID, SALESORDERITEM, PRODUCTID, GROSSAMOUNT, NETAMOUNT, QUANTITY, etc.

Please analyze the BusinessPartners section of the sap_data.csv file. Focus only on business partner data. Identify how these partners relate to sales data analyzed previously. Look for fields like PARTNERID, PARTNERROLE, EMAILADDRESS, COMPANYNAME, etc.

Please analyze the Car_SupplyChainManagement section of the sap_data.csv file. Focus only on supply chain data. Identify connections to previously analyzed data. Look for fields like SupplierID, ProductID, CarMaker, CarModel, CustomerID, OrderID, ShipDate, etc.

Please analyze any remaining sections of the sap_data.csv file that might contain additional data (like 'final sap order items'). Compare this with the other data analyzed earlier and identify differences or additional insights.
Please analyze the Sales Reports.docx document and identify which SAP reports would be most useful for analyzing the datasets we've reviewed so far from sap_data.csv.

Based on all analyses so far, provide a clear explanation of how the different data sections in sap_data.csv relate to each other. Identify key relationships, foreign keys, and data flow across the different data types.

initial_prompt: Based on all data analyzed so far from sap_data.csv, determine which business area requires the most attention. Choose from: 'sales_optimization', 'customer_management', 'supply_chain', or 'order_processing'.

sales_optimization.content: Provide 3 specific recommendations for optimizing sales processes based on the analyzed SAP data.

customer_management.content: Provide 3 specific recommendations for improving customer relationships based on the analyzed SAP data.

supply_chain.content: Provide 3 specific recommendations for enhancing supply chain efficiency based on the analyzed SAP data.

order_processing.content: Provide 3 specific recommendations for streamlining order processing based on the analyzed SAP data.

content: Synthesize all previous analyses into a final SAP data report. Include key findings from each section of sap_data.csv, the priority business area identified, and consolidated recommendations.
